__e: Well, I had to tidy up a bit.
Sorry to surprise you. I was cleaning and I let him in.
Hey! When I'm done doing the dishes, do you guys wanna watch it?
Couldn't you have done the dishes?
You've come to my apartment at 1:00 a.m. and cleaned it.
They laundered it and gave it to men.
I think you might use it again if I washed.
I took it off in the bathroom while I washed my hands.
And they weren't wrong. I did not wash my hands.
I washed my hands for ten minutes last night before bed.
Well, why were you washing dishes so late?
When you saw the place you washed the stairs and the door so one couldn't tell what happened inside.
Didn't you just clean that yesterday?
They took care of everything so don't worry about that.
I'm afraid our problems won't be washed away quite that easily.
Whatever it is you're hiding, pick a spot that won't wash away.
